landing.bio: I am a software engineering student from Centennial college, Canada. I have completed undergraduate degree in Computer Science Engineering from Nehru College of Engineering and an advanced diploma in Artificial Intelligence from NIELIT,India

experience.aboutWork: Internship at the IT sector in Indian Railways
Software Internship in Central government's telecom company

education.degree: Advanced diploma in Software Engineering Technology

education.university: National Institute of Electronics and Information Technology
Nehru college of Engineering and Research Centre
education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering

interests.paragraphOne: I love doing competitive programming, like coding challenges. I also enjoy participating in hackathons and contributing to open source projects.
interests.paragraphTwo: When I am not coding, you can find me reading books or learning to cook.

awards.awardDetail: Graduated Bachelors with First Class with Honors.
Secured 99.89 percentile in Problem Solving Assessment, a national level aptitude test conducted by CBSE
Third in State level essay writing competition
First in district level essay writing and extempore competitions
